value:
Aren't these the most beautiful
spiders you've ever seen? They're
black and purple and green and blue!$k$pNo? But they're so pretty... Aw,
some people will just never get it.

I'm proud to be a wolfskin! Turning
into wolves is what we do.

My tail looks nice and rugged when
it's all messed up and filled with junk.

Let's take a look at my treasure
collection! Just one of my many
fine pieces is an embalmed lizard!$k$pI also have a giant bat corpse! It's
huge!

This way? No... How about that
way? No...$k$pI'm not lost! This castle is just WAY
too big!

Where did I end up now? Hey, you—
do you have any idea how to get back
to $Nf's castle?

Ha ha! Did you SEE that? That's what
it looks like when I get serious!
I wanna play some more. C'mon!

I'm a little bit lost... Don't leave me
behind, OK?

What, my tail? No, it's not wagging!
It's just...twitching! I'm not excited!

I'm Keaton! I'll show you how a
proud wolfskin hunts!

In a wolfskin pack, those who
contribute can walk with pride.$k$pSo what do you say? Am I pulling
my weight?$k$pReally? That's a relief. I know I can
trust you to be honest with me.$k$pI mean...not that I was worried. I'm
not happy to hear you say that.
Nope.$k$pIf I stick with you, I can avoid getting
lost and maybe even accomplish
something!$k$pLeave it to me! I'll hunt your enemies
and collect some awesome hair balls
along the way!
はぁっ！
グルルル…
うああっ！
くそーっ！
You're dead meat.
I'm game for a fight!
Get out of here!
Hunting party!
No...anyone but me...
Haha
I'm Keaton. I'm from a race called the wolfskin.
Hey! You might think I like to be petted...but I don't!
My tail is NOT wagging! It's not! Got it?!
We're gonna take a look at my treasure collection! Look, touch, sniff, and learn!
I've got a spool of spider webbing! There are even spots with flies and bugs and stuff! Sorta like raisins in a cookie.
Here—a necklace made from bat fangs! Just think of all the different animals whose blood is crusted on them!
I'm fine being on my own. But I guess if you really want me to, I'll come with you.
Right.
I'm lost…
I guess.
